Welcome! I’m Adam and this is where I put stuff.

I’m a first year Mathematics student at the University of Cambridge, studying at Gonville and Caius College. Currently, I’m also an intern at Evervault, working on making the web a more secure place.

My main goal in setting up this website is to have a place to put my lecture notes, along with some of the olympiad materials that I have accumulated. I also have a blog, where I write about things that interest me.
